name: Go To Bed (Games Development - IADE-UE)
description:
3D CROSS Project developed by 2nd year students of the Games Development and Global Design courses (2020/2021).

Programmers:

  • André Casa
  • Arthur Wanderkoken

Artists:

  • Beatriz Azevedo
  • Beatriz Rodrigues
  • Bernardo Salgueiro
  • Matilde Pessoa
  • Pedro Blanc

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Walk 
  • Shit (hold) + W - Run
  • Left ctrl (toggle) - Crouch / Crouch walking
  • E - Grab item / Interact with door or object

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
